section.name: Welcome to Aozan

div.style: float: right; margin: 0 10px 20px 20px; padding: 5px; border: 1px solid #999; background-color: #eee;

section.p: Aozan has been developped in order to automatically handle data transfert, demultiplexing conversion, quality control and research contamination once a HiSeq run has been finished. Through our computer infrastructure and the creation of a run design, we are able to get at the end of each run a whole data quality reporting in order to evaluate each sequencing parameter. Aozan is involved in the primary data analysis and produce compressed fastq files from an HiSeq sequencer output
Aozan helps us to greatly improve our efficiency with run data management and to keep tracks of run statistics with several automatic mail information and HTML web pages.
